Class FileVirtualPools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractResources<T>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACLResources, BulkResources<FileVirtualPoolRestRep>, QuotaResources, Resources<FileVirtualPoolRestRep>, TopLevelResources<FileVirtualPoolRestRep>

    public class FileVirtualPools
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<FileVirtualPoolRestRep>
implements TopLevelResources<FileVirtualPoolRestRep>, ACLResources, QuotaResources
    File Virtual Pools resources.

    Base URL: /file/vpools

      • assignStoragePools

        Manually updates storage pool assignments for a given file virtual pool.

        Returns:
